author: jerenkrantz
msg: I heard we used this neato webserver that had the functionality for
automatically including last modified dates of the source file.
(Unless of course, we don't like using that feature on daedalus.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: As discussed on dev@apr - add a comment about the assert/checking
input debate.  Our policy is "don't check input values."  Feel free
to change the wording.  It's something, but we've had two longish
threads in the last day about this...
Also, let people know that they can (should) resubmit patches if no
one gives feedback.
